layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [bgcolor=#C0C0C0]
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 410x584 [border: (5px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (5,5) size 400x574
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 400x570
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,275) size 396x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 392x19
                text run at (2,2) width 392: "This table is set to a height of 100%. It should just fit the page."
